div.style: background: url('') no-repeat top center; background-size: 100%;

p.br: The Talbot County Board of Education is committed to promoting the worth and dignity of all individuals. The Board will not tolerate nor condone any act of bias, discrimination, insensitivity, or disrespect toward any person on the basis of race, color, sexual orientation, age, national origin, religion, socio-economic status, sex, ancestry, marital status, gender identity, genetic information or disabling condition. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies: Title IX/504 Coordinator, 12 Magnolia Street Easton, MD 21601, 410-822-0330.

div.p: Report suspected child abuse and neglect to the Talbot County Department of Social Services (410) 770-4848

National Human Trafficking Hotline: 1-888-373-7888
The BeFree Textline Number: Text HELP or INFO to 233733 (BEFREE)
